      • new_member

        public void new_member()
        Add a new train

      • addToRoute

        public void addToRoute(java.lang.String LocomotiveName,
              java.lang.String journeyID)
        Add a journey to the train。
        参数:
        LocomotiveName - Name of the train
        journeyID - Name of the journey to be added

      • deleteJourneyFromLocomotive

        public void deleteJourneyFromLocomotive(java.lang.String LocomotiveName,
                               java.lang.String journeyID)
        Delete a journey from a train。
        参数:
        LocomotiveName - Name of the train
        journeyID - Name of the journey to be deleted

      • deleteLocomotive

        public void deleteLocomotive(java.lang.String LocomotiveName)
        Delete a train
        参数:
        LocomotiveName - Name of the train to be deleted.

      • allLocomotive

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allLocomotive()
        Get all the trains
        返回:
        Name of all the trains

      • search_name

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search_name(java.lang.String name)
        Get journeys belongs to a train
        参数:
        name - Name of the train to query
        返回:
        All the journeys of this train。

      • find_Freetime

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> find_Freetime(java.lang.String name)
        Get the free time of a train。
        参数:
        name - Name of the train to query
        返回:
        Free time of this train in pairs。

      • checkTimeConflict

        public int checkTimeConflict(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> arriveTimeList,
                    java.lang.String locomotiveName)
        Judge whether the train's busy time conflicts with a journey
        参数:
        arriveTimeList - the time list of the journey to query
        locomotiveName - Name of the train to check
        返回:
        If time conflicts, return 1; if not, return -1

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] arg)
